original_text: The leader of the priests, Azariah from Zadok's clan, said, ‘The people have brought a lot of gifts to the Lord's temple. Since they started to do that, we have had enough food to eat. There has been a lot more food than we need. The Lord has blessed his people, so we still have all this extra food.’
korean_text: 사독의 족속 대제사장 아사랴가 그에게 대답하여 이르되 백성이 예물을 여호와의 전에 드리기 시작함으로부터 우리가 만족하게 먹었으나 남은 것이 많으니 이는 여호와께서 그의 백성에게 복을 주셨음이라 그 남은 것이 이렇게 많이 쌓였나이다

sentences.original_text: The leader of the priests, Azariah from Zadok's clan, said,
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장의 우두머리인 사독 족속 아사랴가 말하기를,

sentences.original_text: The people have brought a lot of gifts
Since they started to do that,
we have had enough food to eat.
There has been a lot more food than we need.
sentences.korean_translation: 필요한 것보다 훨씬 더 많은 음식이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The Lord has blessed his people,
so we still have all this extra food.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리에게는 아직도 이 모든 남은 음식이 있습니다.'
